title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-3.12 - Inspection and reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-3.12 - Inspection and reporting

State Regulations

Each owner or operator of a permitted facility subject to
these requirements must annually inspect that facility and submit a report to
the commissioner, certifying that the condition and operation of that facility, including the calibration of all instrumentation, meet manufacturer's
specifications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-3.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
